attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The Bible is the holy book of Christians and we object to the violation of the holy word of God at the exhibition at the Gallery of Modern Art (Goma) in Glasgow. Stop defacing the Bible now this action is unacceptable.  This is Country was founded on Christian principles and it's time to get back to basics. This exhibition is funded by public funds and we the Christian public object.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
